updateBuild(ObservableObject, Map) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObserverRemoteView

updateBuild(ObservableObject, NetGaming) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ServerController
This method is called when a client wants to perform a certain build, if the player cannot perform a build because the indicated one is forbidden or because it isn't its turn or it is the wrong phase, this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.
updateBuild(ObservableObject, NetGaming) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObserverController
Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because someone wants to build.
updateColors(ObservableGame, HashMap<String, Color>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.RemoteView
When this method is called it informs the player about the color chosen by the other players, if all players have chosen card it change the handler phase and says to the client that he enters in the god selection phase
updateColors(ObservableGame, HashMap<String, Color>) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObserverRemoteView
This method is called when game state changed because a player has chosen a color and the player will be informed about the chosen colors.
updateColors(ObservableObject, NetColorPreparation) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ServerController
This method receives a request from a client through its RemoteView and analyze if it's the player's turn and if it is the correct phase (the color phase), if this conditions are all true then the method calls the SetupManager, otherwise it calls the error handling method of the RemoteView.
updateColors(ObservableObject, NetColorPreparation) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObserverController
Updates the observer when the observer calls this method because a player wants to choose a color.

updateDefeat(ObservableGame, String) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObserverRemoteView

updateGameFinished(ObservableGame) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.util.observers.ObserverRemoteView
This method is called when game state changed because it is finished and the player will be notified.

userInputController - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.view.CliInitial
 
UserInputController - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.controller
This class is used by the Cli to send the input that the client insert to the server, it receives a command and translate it in a network message to pass to the ClientMessageListener to send to the server.
UserInputController(ClientMessageListener) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.ui.cli.controller.UserInputController
It creates a user input controller with the given listener ad argument.
UserInputTimeoutException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.util.exceptions
The FirstPlayerException is an exception used by the CLI version of the game in getting input phase, this exception says that a message arrived from the server and the user hasn't wrote commands within a certain amount of time given to it.
UserInputTimeoutException() - Constructor for exception it.polimi.ingsw.util.exceptions.UserInputTimeoutException
It creates and empty UserInputTimeoutException.
UserInputTimeoutException(String) - Constructor for exception it.polimi.ingsw.util.exceptions.UserInputTimeoutException
It creates a UserInputTimeoutException with msg message.
